attributes.action: add his DNA to the database, and insist all MP's and police officers do the same
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: after all, if he insists it is morally the right thing to do, to prevent innocent people having their DNA removed from the database, then what problem will he have with this proposal? (detail: the PM might well have done his part already, a photoshoot a while back I believe.. but now he must change policy such that all civil servants, all MPs, all MEPs, all Lords and Ladies, all police officers, all MI5, MI6 and all intelligence officers do the same). There cannot be double standards.

rejection.details: Your petition should make a point about government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
